property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Audit Completion Check

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report looks at previously run batch audits and shows the number of complete versus incomplete audits in that batch. It also identifies which audits used in-progress courses.

property.name: description
property.value: JobId for the Audit(s)

property.name: queryLoV
property.value: select ('BAT' || SUBSTR('0000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 3) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') as RESULT, (('BAT' || SUBSTR('0000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 3) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))) || ' - ' || b.description) as LABEL from batch b order by b.id

property.name: label
property.value: Report Type

property.name: description
property.value: Report Type of the Audit (HTML, TXT, PDF), defaults to PDF

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Accept Course Count

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report looks at previously run batch audits and lists a count of each course and how many times it was applied to audits within this batch.

property.name: description
property.value: JobId for the Audit(s)

property.name: queryLoV
property.value: select ('BAT' || SUBSTR('00000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 5 - LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)))) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') as RESULT, (('BAT' || SUBSTR('00000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 5 - LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)))) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') || ' - ' || b.description) as LABEL from batch b order by b.id

property.name: label
property.value: Report Type

property.name: description
property.value: Report Type of the Audit (HTML, TXT, PDF), defaults to PDF

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Requirement Completion Grid

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report looks at previously run batch audits and breaks down requirement completion per student in grid format.

property.name: description
property.value: JobId for the Audit(s)

property.name: queryLoV
property.value: select ('BAT' || SUBSTR('00000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 5 - LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)))) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') as RESULT, (('BAT' || SUBSTR('00000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 5 - LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)))) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') || ' - ' || b.description) as LABEL from batch b order by b.id

property.name: label
property.value: Report Type

property.name: description
property.value: Report Type of the Audit (HTML, TXT, PDF), defaults to PDF

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Requirement Percent Complete

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report looks at previously run batch audits and details, per student, to see how much they have completed each requirement found on their audit.

property.name: description
property.value: JobId for the Audit(s)

property.name: queryLoV
property.value: select ('BAT' || SUBSTR('00000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 5 - LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)))) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') as RESULT, (('BAT' || SUBSTR('00000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 5 - LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)))) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') || ' - ' || b.description) as LABEL from batch b order by b.id

property.name: label
property.value: Report Type

property.name: description
property.value: Report Type of the Audit (HTML, TXT, PDF), defaults to PDF

property.name: label
property.value: Student List

property.name: description
property.value: List of Student Numbers (comma-separated) for the report to display.

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Course Demand Overview

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report details a total count of each course students have added to their declared plans within u.direct, breaking it down by term.

property.name: label
property.value: Start YearTerm

property.name: description
property.value: Starting Year Term for Report to Run From.

property.name: label
property.value: End YearTerm

property.name: description
property.value: Ending Year Term for Report to Run To.

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Planned Courses by Term

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report details a total count of each course students have added to their declared plans within u.direct, breaking it down by term. It also displays how many of those courses were added to approved versus non-approved plans.

property.name: label
property.value: Start YearTerm

property.name: description
property.value: Starting Year Term for Report to Run From.

property.name: label
property.value: End YearTerm

property.name: description
property.value: Ending Year Term for Report to Run To.

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Planned Courses by Course

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report details the terms in which courses were added to student plans within u.direct, breaking it down by course. It also displays how many of those courses were added to approved versus non-approved plans.

property.name: label
property.value: Course List

property.name: description
property.value: List of Courses (comma-separated) for the report to display.

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Course Search

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report allows you to do a Find Course, looking at Convert, String, Repeat, Sub-requirement, TA Source, and TA Target areas by course name, instidq, instid and/or instcd.

property.name: label
property.value: Select Course

property.name: description
property.value: Course you wish to search for

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Number of Rules by TA School

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report displays a count of the number of rules for each school set up in the transfer articulation tables.

property.name: description
property.value: List of Source Ids (comma-separated) for the report to display.

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Number of Student Courses by TA School

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report displays a count of the total number of student courses per source institution.

property.value: List of Source Ids (comma-separated) for the report to display.

property.name: reportLabel
property.value: Number of Students by TA School

property.name: reportDescription
property.value: This report displays a count of the number of students who have coursework for each source institution.

property.name: description
property.value: List of Source Ids (comma-separated) for the report to display.

property.value: Most Used Requirements

property.name: reportDescription

property.name: queryLoV
property.value: select ('BAT' || SUBSTR('00000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 5 - LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)))) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') as RESULT, (('BAT' || SUBSTR('00000', LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10))), 5 - LENGTH(CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)))) || CAST(b.id as VARCHAR(10)) || '%') || ' - ' || b.description) as LABEL from batch b order by b.id
